attributes.action: Keep the NHS from being privatised .
attributes.additional_details: We have hundreds of doctors and nurses leaving the NHS because they are totally stressed,  resources totally stretched , the government is clearly not listening , we need more of our money directing to the services , NOW before it's too late , let's remind the government who put them in their positions of power , we pay them to do the right job , not for them to destroy something so great before our very eyes , #SAVEOURNHS 👊🏻
attributes.background: We want to keep our NHS free, we do not want the threat of privatisation, we want more of the millions£ promised in the brexit manifesto to go to the NHS services as promised .
